metadata.description: The Storm has broken, and the War to decide the fate of Humanity begins! A mighty clash of armies sets off the latest mini-series from veteran comic creator Joe Wight, launching the final showdown between Old America and the tyrannical Neo-Fascists controlling Central and South America. The mysterious "Elysium" also plays its trump card in the form of a deadly nuclear space platform to stop the Americans in their tracks.
metadata.name: Twilight X War Vol 1
